name: Cryptic College
storyline: 12 students are put in a group together by their tech class professor. Their goal? Create a completely unique social media website. But while working on the site, romance will bloom. Will those romances become something beautiful? Or will they fall apart into a blazing inferno?
summary: Cryptic College is a visual novel in which you can choose romance 11 different characters. But be careful! You never know what someone could be hiding...
